data.title: These guys are killing it!
data.text: I had been hearing about this place for a long long time. Was driving by and decided to stop and get a cheesesteak to-go, was very pleased that I did! Got home and opened up what would be the best cheesesteak Ive ever had! Can't wait to come back!!

data.title: Most Addictive Restaurant
data.text: This family owned business totally rocks. I don't know anyone who doesn't love it.   The  food is beyond delicious and the service is hometown friendly.

data.title: Great filling sanwhiches!
data.text:
Had this place recommended by Phil A. so it should be good.
I have ordered the Cheese steak.....good, I recommend adding the pepper relish it really adds a great "zing". good size and quality. The Chicken marinara was really good. My favorite sandwich is the "Big Daddy sub..it is amazing! It's $9.95 and is huge, 3x the meat as fresh cut subs. Great mix of meats and cheeses. Takes a littlt time to get your order done, but that's because they make everything fresh.......except the mac n cheese apparently buy some of the other reviews I read. Fries are good as well.
Definitely recommend this place if you want a great sandwich that will fill you up and satisfy your taste buds.(Remember to add the pepper relish and other spices to taste.
I always add mayo and mustered to the Big Daddy sub with the relish....amazing!

Great staff, friendly and they really try hard for their customers.

data.title: Best Hot Subs in town!
data.text: They offer the best Philly Cheese, great portions, super fresh,  and delish. They have a variety of subs, homemade sausages, and fantastic relish to top anything.  Seating is quaint and right in mid of downtown Hemet. I love that they are family operated and very nice.
